member.summary: Contains methods for resolving the home directory path.

member.name: M:Okta.Sdk.Abstractions.HomePath.Resolve(System.String[])
member.summary: Resolves a collection of path segments with a home directory path.
member.remarks: Provides support for Unix-like paths on Windows. If the first path segment starts with ~, this segment is prepended with the home directory path.
member.returns: A combined path which includes the resolved home directory path (if necessary).

member.summary: Resolves the current user's home directory path.

member.name: T:Okta.Sdk.Abstractions.RequestContext
member.summary: Contains information about the downstream request from a client or browser to the application.
member.remarks: This class is used to pass request details (like the X-Forwarded-For header) from the client request through to the Okta API. Null properties are ignored.
